name: Colored Firefox's HTTPS Location Bar
description:
Coloring Firefox's HTTPS Location Bar based on security level.
Solid green = verified identity
Light green = verified domain
Bright yellow = weak cipher
Light red = mixed content
additional_info:
v20151230.01
This code was taken from @paltus's answer to the following topic:-
Coloring in location bar broken ( http://forums.mozillazine.org/viewtopic.php?f=23&t=2969105 )
It works perfectly with Firefox 43+ (also works well with the older versions).
